AboutSection.title: About me
AboutSection.paragraphOne: After graduating in Computer Science in 2014, I decided to continue learning and dedicate myself to my passion for programming. I decided to delve into programming and web development through the Javascript language; both self-taught and through several full-stack courses to update and raise my level, where I could acquire knowledge about different frameworks and technologies, as well as deepen in solving real and current problems.
AboutSection.paragraphTwo: My favorite part of programming is problem solving. I love the feeling of finding, or providing, a solution to a problem. My main stack is React, Next.js, Node.js, Typescript and Postgres. I am also familiar with Angular, MongoDB, Prisma among others. I'm always looking to learn new technologies.
AboutSection.paragraphThree: When I'm not programming, I like to play video games, watch movies, read and work out at the gym. I also skateboard, fish, and generally enjoy every moment in my life.

Projects.title: Major Projects
Projects.aclDescription: I worked as a full-stack developer on this startup project for 8 months. A panel to manage geofences.
Projects.achsDescription: Dashboard for workers and patients of the Chilean health system. It has features such as filtering, sorting and pagination.
Projects.sitaDescription: Application to manage flights and diversions by airlines. It also allows interaction between the cabin crew and flight coordinators. Uses Microsoft Graph api.
Projects.svdDescription: E-commerce of the company SVD. Upgraded from Magento to market leading technologies. It has many of the best integrations of the moment.
Projects.iberiaDescription: Passenger and baggage management application used by IBERIA's coordinating agents. It consumes and processes data in real time.
Projects.cmrcDescription: Car rental website designed with a focus on user experience. Intuitive and efficient reservation system with secure payment integration and flexible rental options.

Resume.tagline: I'm a full-stack software developer with a focus on web development.
Resume.description: I'm a passionate Full Stack developer with solid experience in the creation and improvement of web and mobile applications. Throughout my career, I have worked on a variety of projects, taking on key roles that have strengthened my technical skills and my ability to provide innovative solutions. My primary focus has been web development, and I have worked with various technologies to meet the goals of my clients and employers.

Education.title: Education
Education.universityName: University of Oriente, Santiago of Cuba, Cuba
Education.universityPara: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

Works.title: My Experience
Works.firstJob_description: I worked for the IT department teaching Data Structuring 1 and 2 / Databases and Software Engineering classes as well as participating in the development of the Taxia Detection software using the following technologies: Asp.Net 3.5 MVC + JQuery + SQL Server + HTML5 + CSS.
Works.secondJob_description: I worked on the applications department in the development and maintenance of SISCONT v4 v5 and v6 software using the following technologies: Angular 7/8 + Typescript + Bootstrap + HTML5 + CSS + Ignia + Genexus + SQL Server.
Works.threeJob_description: I worked on the update and optimization of the website(Swiss) Marketplace Boilerplate using the following technologies: Angular 8 + Typescript + Bootstrap + HTML5 + CSS + Nodejs + Express + MongoDB + Jsonwebtoken + Mongoose.
Works.fourJob_description: I worked on the update and optimization of the Mealdeals app(swiss) using the following technologies: Ionic-Angular + Bootstrap + HTML5 + CSS + Nodejs + Express + MongoDB + Jsonwebtoken + Mongoose.
Works.fiveJob_description: I worked on the development and maintenance of the (Swiss) Autovenn website using the following technologies: Angular 9 + Typescript + Bootstrap + HTML5 + CSS + Nodejs + Express + MongoDB + Jsonwebtoken + Mongoose.
Works.sixJob_description: I worked on the update and optimization of the Growing Brilliant website using the following technologies: React 15 + Bootstrap + HTML5 + CSS.
Works.sevenJob_description: I worked on the development and maintenance of the web site/app Common Health Coordination Portal for the Chilean health system using the following technologies: React 15 + Typescript + Material UI + HTML5 + CSS + Nodejs + Express + Jsonwebtoken + Sequelize.
Works.eightJob_description: I worked on the development and maintenance of the Transport-Administration web site for the use of geofences using the following technologies: Angular 11 + Typescript + Material UI + HTML5 + CSS + Firebase (Auth - Firestore - Storage - Realtime Database).
Works.nineJob_description: I worked on the PreconZ project in the development of a web/mobile application for the control of projects and users using the following technologies: React 18 + React-Native + Typescript + Material UI +NativeBase + HTML5 + CSS + Firebase (Auth - Firestore - Storage - Realtime Database) + HubSpot.
Works.tenJob_description: I worked on the development of a web site/app Digital Admission for the Chilean health system using the following technologies: React 16 + Material UI+ Node.js + Typescript + Express + Sequelize + Nestjs + .Net Core 6 + HTML5 and CSS.
Works.elevenJob_description: I worked on the Mission Control web/mobile application for flight control at airports and in airplanes using the following technologies: React 16/React-Native + Typescript + Graph API with Microsoft Teams  Node.js + Express + MongoDB + Material UI + HTML5 and CSS.
Works.twelveJob_description: I worked on the improvement and update of their website using the following technologies: Next.js 12/13 + Typescript + Tailwind CSS + Formik + React-Cookie + GraphQL(Apollo Client + Graph Codegen) for layout and data requests to the backend and Cypress for the testing.
Works.thirteenJob_description: I worked on the improvement and update of the Aviato software  using the following technologies: Next.js 12 + Typescript + Chakra UI + Apollo GraphQL + Nodejs + MikroORM + Express + PostgreSQL + Keycloak + AWS.
Works.fourteenJob_description: I work on the development and maintenance of the TAM module and integrations of the Pax & Bags application using the following technologies: React 18 + Nestjs(CQRS) + Typescript + GraphQL + Postgres + TailwindCSS + Cypress + Docker + AWS.
Works.fifteenJob_description: Create a car rental website designed with a focus on user experience. The booking system is intuitive and efficient, with secure payment integration and flexible rental options. I used the following technologies: Next.js 14/15, TypeScript, Shadcn, Auth.js, React-Hook-Form, Prisma, PostgreSQL and Vercel.
